page.title: 07NASH COURT FARM
page.content:
Nash Court Farm is owned by a Mr Horne. On this farm there is a rare pedigree of{Romney Sheep}which have been reared here for many,many years.
Within this square there is a temporary cement works, sited where the road passes under the railway line, supplying materials for the{M20 {Motor-way}extention.
There are good examples of{Hazel}being used to line roads and provide fencing, a feature of this locality.
Several footpaths criss-cross the area which is flat and featureless though the ground does rise gradually from South to North.
